english.segment1: Set this place on fire, burn it to the ground. Cause I dont want to live here anymore. take away these thoughts that empty me. Could You take them all away?
english.segment2: Am I too blind? I cant see, its killing me. I feed off abuse, nothings changed. It always bleeds like this
english.segment3: The holiest of liars, what have I become?. Im holding on to nothing once again. Addiction holds the keys to my freedom. Could You take it all away?
english.segment4: Am I too blind? I cant see. It always bleeds like this.
